com.pb.locationintelligence.geolife

Interface GeoLifeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeoLifeServiceImpl

    public interface GeoLifeService
    This GeoLifeService Version 2 provides demographic data and lifestyle characteristics for a specific area.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getDemographicsByAddress(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String profile, java.lang.String filter, RequestObserver<GeoLifeResponse> requestObserver)
      Returns the geodemographic range variables - ageTheme, genderTheme, maritalStatusTheme, ethnicityTheme, HouseholdSizeTheme etc based on an address provided
      void getDemographicsByLocation(android.content.Context context, java.lang.Double latitude, java.lang.Double longitude, java.lang.String profile, java.lang.String filter, RequestObserver<GeoLifeResponse> requestObserver)
      Returns the geodemographic range variables - ageTheme, genderTheme, maritalStatusTheme, ethnicityTheme, HouseholdSizeTheme etc based on a location provided

    • Method Detail

      • getDemographicsByAddress

        void getDemographicsByAddress(android.content.Context context,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String country,
                            java.lang.String profile,
                            java.lang.String filter,
                            RequestObserver<GeoLifeResponse> requestObserver)
        Returns the geodemographic range variables - ageTheme, genderTheme, maritalStatusTheme, ethnicityTheme, HouseholdSizeTheme etc based on an address provided
        Parameters:
        context - Required - Android Context
        address - Required - Free-form address text
        country - Optional - Country Code Acceptable list of country codes: USA,CAN,AUS,SWE,JPN,GBR
        profile - Optional - Pre-defined profiles sets. Below are the values: 'Top5Ascending': Retrieves the top 5 results in ascending order. 'Top5Decending': Retrieves the top 5 results in descending order. 'Top3Ascending': Retrieves the top 3 results in ascending order. 'Top3Decending': Retrieves the top 3 results in descending order
        filter - Optional - Represents demographic themes to narrow down search results for example; AgeTheme, IncomeTheme, EthnicityTheme Maximum number of themes that can be provided as a filter are 10.
        requestObserver - Required - Asynchronous request observer

      • getDemographicsByLocation

        void getDemographicsByLocation(android.content.Context context,
                             java.lang.Double latitude,
                             java.lang.Double longitude,
                             java.lang.String profile,
                             java.lang.String filter,
                             RequestObserver<GeoLifeResponse> requestObserver)
        Returns the geodemographic range variables - ageTheme, genderTheme, maritalStatusTheme, ethnicityTheme, HouseholdSizeTheme etc based on a location provided
        Parameters:
        context - Required - Android Context
        latitude - Required - latitude of the location
        longitude - Required - longitude of the location
        profile - Optional - Pre-defined profiles sets. Below are the values: 'Top5Ascending': Retrieves the top 5 results in ascending order. 'Top5Decending': Retrieves the top 5 results in descending order. 'Top3Ascending': Retrieves the top 3 results in ascending order. 'Top3Decending': Retrieves the top 3 results in descending order
        filter - Optional - Represents demographic themes to narrow down search results for example; AgeTheme, IncomeTheme, EthnicityTheme Maximum number of themes that can be provided as a filter are 10.
        requestObserver - Required - Asynchronous request observer
